Uses of Class
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.download.DownloadSpecs.TemporaryImageSpecs

Packages that use DownloadSpecs.TemporaryImageSpecs
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.download Contains utilities for downloading bitmaps and binding them to ImageView or any widget which can display a Bitmap. 
 

Uses of DownloadSpecs.TemporaryImageSpecs in com.smartnsoft.droid4me.download
 

Subclasses of DownloadSpecs.TemporaryImageSpecs in com.smartnsoft.droid4me.download
static class DownloadSpecs.DefaultImageSpecs
          Enables to express an image specification, with a size and a default image resource id, in case the URL does not correspond to an image.
static class DownloadSpecs.SizedImageSpecs
          Enables to express an image specification, which indicates its size and a temporary image resource identification.
